sect1.title: Build Flags
sect1.para: We will need to copy our BUILD Variables into our new system. So when we boot-up they will be there:

screen.userinput: echo export BUILD32=\""${BUILD32}\"" >> ${LFS}/root/.bash_profile echo export BUILD64=\""${BUILD64}\"" >> ${LFS}/root/.bash_profile echo export LFS_TARGET32=\""${LFS_TARGET32}\"" >> ${LFS}/root/.bash_profile
